regen.absent_element: situation where user departs early and a CO replaces them
regen.new_specification: If a user leaves the game before it officially ends, a Computer Opponent will automatically take their place to continue the game seamlessly.

regen.absent_element: New Computer Opponent takes user's place if they depart early
regen.new_specification: When a user exits the game prematurely, a Computer Opponent will automatically take their place.

regen.absent_element: replacement of a departing user with a Computer Opponent (CO)
regen.new_specification: If a user leaves the game early, the system will automatically substitute their position with a Computer Opponent (CO).

label: If a user leaves the game prematurely, a new CO is created to fill their place.
absence: creation of a new CO to fill the place of a user leaving the game prematurely
